title: In-N-Out Hamburger Calories
meta_description: Learn in n out hamburger calories: about 240 kcal per burger, plus full nutrition facts on protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out hamburger: 100% beef patty, toasted bun, lettuce, tomato, onion, signature spread; no cheese or customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and custom orders; values based on official In-N-Out data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: A standard In-N-Out hamburger contains about 240 calories and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Animal style (extra spread, grilled onions, mustard-fried patty)

faqs.q: How many calories in an In-N-Out hamburger?
faqs.a: A standard In-N-Out hamburger has 240 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for In-N-Out hamburger calories?
faqs.a: Includes 39 g carbs, 16 g protein, 10 g fat, and 520 mg sodium.

faqs.q: Does the In-N-Out hamburger have trans fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 0.5 g trans fat per hamburger from the beef patty.

faqs.q: How does adding cheese affect In-N-Out hamburger calories?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases calories by about 50, totaling 290 kcal.

faqs.q: Are In-N-Out hamburger calories the same as a cheeseburger?
faqs.a: No, the cheeseburger has 480 kcal due to the extra cheese and larger patty.
